author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
I am a very distrustful person. It is very hard to earn my trust. Or if you lost it, you will never get it back.

So these surveys and whatnot, with skewed numbers and sampling...I just can't trust.

It's too late to get it back.

I trust my experience, what my senses perceive.

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
Aksyon Demokratiko was founded by Raul Roco. Where is it now?
PDP-LABAN was founded by Ninoy Aquino and Aquilino Pimentel.
Where is it now?

Just because SWS and Pulse Asia had its origins in "good" doesn't mean it will always remain impervious to the "not good". https://t.co/u38P09h9Fc

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text: But they even violated a law stating that no surveys should be conducted within 15 days from the time of election. LOL. https://t.co/BiYO3Q90EB

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
My generation had the benefit and advantage of a school curriculum that detailed the atrocities of the Marcos regime and Martial Law.

No wonder we got the bulk of the votes for #LeniRobredo. 

Ewan ko kung ano pinagtuturo ng mga teacher sa school ng sumunod na generation. https://t.co/dWB3UlOQ50

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
Nalukungkot ako para sa kanya at para kay Loren.

It should never be like this between family members, especially parents and their children.

But that's how bad--evil--having a Marcos and a Duterte in tandem, supported by a murder of crow-cronies in the senate and congress. https://t.co/EUka7Uy4Fr

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
And we probably deserve all the crap in our lives as Filipino citizens  because we did it to ourselves.

We basically asked for it.

The crap, I mean. https://t.co/L5D8w8Hts0

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
You can really count on Jolina to dish out heartwarmingly sincere songs about hope and love. 

#LeniLiwanagSaDilim #LeniKiko2022 #Chel #Leila #baguilat #alexlacson #matula #trillanes #Risa #Colmenares #Zubiaga https://t.co/OFPD8gDV9W

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text: My Tolkien heart is pounding! https://t.co/5BNiWcwzVJ

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text:
Obviously, hindi.

You will be surprised at how many Christians only know the fear of God when they're a second from literally mortally dying. https://t.co/IIpQPI5ghR

author: Fritzie Bayrante
text: Let her talk. She's a very effective speaker. And she has the personal experience of someone familiar and intimate with opposing sides of the political game. https://t.co/hQlIbtGFkA
